title: 89/267/EEC: Commission Decision of 30 March 1989 approving the plan relating to the examination for residues of substances other than those having a hormonal action submitted by Italy (Only the Italian text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 30 March 1989 approving the plan relating to the examination for residues of substances other than those having a hormonal action submitted by Italy (Only the Italian text is authentic) (89/267/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The plan relating to the examination for residues of the substances referred to in Annex I, Groups A.III and B to Directive 86/469/EEC submitted by Italy is hereby approved.
Italy shall adopt the necessary laws, regulations and administrative provisions for the implementation of the plan referred to in Article 1.
This Decision is addressed to the Kingdom of Italy.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 30 March 1989.
For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 275, 26. 9. 1986, p. 36.
